ai.summary: A short, easy coastal walk of 4.6 km from Klye to Balnakeil in the UK. The route follows a mix of grassy coastal paths and shoreline sections, offering sea views and a beginner-friendly outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Coastal terrain with well-defined paths, grassy verges, occasional sandy or rocky beach sections, and some wetter, slippery patches. Expect wind exposure near the shore and uneven ground near cliff edges.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide times and weather before setting out. Stay on marked paths and away from cliff edges. Wear sturdy footwear and be prepared for wind, spray, and slippery surfaces. Bring water, a basic first-aid kit, a charged phone, and extra layers. Daylight can be limited in shoulder seasons.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Layered clothing with a waterproof/windproof jacket
Mobile phone and emergency contact information
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn (roughly May–September) are ideal for this easy coastal route, with longer daylight and generally milder conditions. Winter to early spring can be windy and wet, with reduced daylight.

seo.title: Klye Coastal Route to Balnakeil – Easy 4.6 km Coastal Walk
seo.meta_description: Discover the easy 4.6 km Klye Coastal Route to Balnakeil. This beginner-friendly coastal hike offers sea views, practical safety tips, gear ideas, and the best seasons.
